statements: DELETE FROM DrugComparison WHERE drug_id = 100 AND drug_name = 'Drug A';
DELETE FROM DrugComparison WHERE established_treatment_outcome = 'Positive' AND new_drug_outcome = 'Negative';
DELETE FROM drug_trials WHERE efficacy_score < 0.5 AND outcome = 'High Risk'
DELETE FROM treatment_protocols WHERE effectiveness_rating > 8 AND notes LIKE '%urgent%'
DELETE FROM Outcomes WHERE outcome_score < 5.0 AND outcome_id % 2 = 0;
DELETE FROM Outcomes WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND treatment_id = 2002;
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Male';
